item.title: SLOG: serializable, low-latency, geo-replicated transactions
item.description: リンク SLOG: serializable, low-latency, geo-replicated transactions | the morning paper 抜粋・メモ シリアライザブルの実現にはcoodinationが必要で，そのため性能が犠牲になる challenge with strict serializability (or even just serializability on a regular DBMS)
